site_description: Agent Consulting from the heart of Europe on a fantastic day. OpenClaw expert and contributor based in Berlin.
hero_tagline: Agent Consulting from the heart of Europe on a fantastic day.
hero_bio: I'm Philip, passionate OpenClaw user and contributor based in Berlin. I help companies deploy AI agents effectively.
service_installation_desc: Setup, configuration and deployment of OpenClaw for your team.
service_consulting_desc: Architecture, strategy and best practices for agent systems.
service_training_desc: Workshops and onboarding for your team.
service_talks_desc: Conference talks and company presentations about AI agents.
